entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:27 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 10:30 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: NNE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 60 gusting to 80 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023
